address_information.section_description: You can update Your Address information using form below.

mail.mail_config_desc: Below is the form for Configuring Email driver for sending emails from the app. You can also configure third party providers like Sendgrid, SES etc.

company_info.section_description: Information about your company that will be displayed on invoices, estimates and other documents created by Crater.
company_info.delete_company_description: Once you delete your company, you will lose all the data and files associated with it permanently.
company_info.delete_company_modal_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete {company} and all of its associated data.

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.section_description: Customize your Invoices, Estimates & Payment Receipts with your own fields. Make sure to use the below added fields on the address formats on Customization settings page.
custom_fields.label: Label
custom_fields.name: Name
custom_fields.help_text_description: Enter some text to help users understand the purpose of this custom field.
custom_fields.custom_field_confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this Custom Field
custom_fields.already_in_use: Custom Field is already in use
custom_fields.press_enter_to_add: Press enter to add new option
custom_fields.model_in_use: Cannot update model for fields which are already in use.
custom_fields.type_in_use: Cannot update type for fields which are already in use.

customization.learn_custom_format: Learn how to use custom format
customization.series_description: To set a static prefix/postfix like 'INV' across your company. It supports character length of up to 6 chars.
customization.delimiter_description: Single character for specifying the boundary between 2 separate components. By default its set to -
customization.date_format_description: A local date and time field which accepts a format parameter. The default format: 'Y' renders the current year.
customization.sequence_description: Consecutive sequence of numbers across your company. You can specify the length on the given parameter.
customization.customer_series_description: To set a different prefix/postfix for each customer.
customization.customer_sequence_description: Consecutive sequence of numbers for each of your customer.
customization.random_sequence_description: Random alphanumeric string. You can specify the length on the given parameter.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.invoice_number_format_description: Customize how your invoice number gets generated automatically when you create a new invoice.
invoices.due_date_description: Specify how due date is automatically set when you create an invoice.
invoices.set_due_date_automatically_description: Enable this if you wish to set due date automatically when you create a new invoice.
invoices.default_formats_description: Below given formats are used to fill up the fields automatically on invoice creation.
invoices.invoice_email_attachment_setting_descrip: Enable this if you want to send invoices as email attachment. Please note that 'View Invoice' button in emails will not be displayed anymore when enabled.
invoices.disable_on_invoice_partial_paid: Disable after partial payment is recorded
invoices.disable_on_invoice_paid: Disable after full payment is recorded
invoices.retrospective_edits_description: Based on your country's laws or your preference, you can restrict users from editing finalised invoices.

estimates.title: Estimates
estimates.estimate_number_format_description: Customize how your estimate number gets generated automatically when you create a new estimate.
estimates.expiry_date_description: Specify how expiry date is automatically set when you create an estimate.
estimates.set_expiry_date_automatically_descriptio: Enable this if you wish to set expiry date automatically when you create a new estimate.
estimates.default_formats_description: Below given formats are used to fill up the fields automatically on estimate creation.
estimates.estimate_email_attachment_setting_descri: Enable this if you want to send the estimates as an email attachment. Please note that 'View Estimate' button in emails will not be displayed anymore when enabled.
estimates.convert_estimate_description: Specify what happens to the estimate after it gets converted to an invoice.

payments.title: Payments
payments.payment_number_format_description: Customize how your payment number gets generated automatically when you create a new payment.
payments.default_formats_description: Below given formats are used to fill up the fields automatically on payment creation.
payments.payment_email_attachment_setting_descrip: Enable this if you want to send the payment receipts as an email attachment. Please note that 'View Payment' button in emails will not be displayed anymore when enabled.

items.item_unit_confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this Item unit
items.already_in_use: Item Unit is already in use

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Save time by creating notes and reusing them on your invoices, estimates & payments.
notes.name: Name
notes.note_confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this Note

account_settings.name: Name
account_settings.section_description: You can update your name, email & password using the form below.

notification.title: Notifications
notification.description: Which email notifications would you like to receive when something changes?
notification.invoice_viewed_desc: When your customer views the invoice sent via crater dashboard.
notification.estimate_viewed_desc: When your customer views the estimate sent via crater dashboard.

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: Manage the roles & permissions of this company
roles.name: Name
roles.confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this Role

exchange_rate.title: Fix Currency Exchange issues
exchange_rate.description: Please enter exchange rate of all the currencies mentioned below to help Crater properly calculate the amounts in {currency}.
exchange_rate.providers_description: Configure your exchange rate providers here to automatically fetch the latest exchange rate on transactions.
exchange_rate.name: Name
exchange_rate.exchange_rate_confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this driver
exchange_rate.default_currency_error: This currency is already used in one of the Active Provider
exchange_rate.exchange_help_text: Enter exchange rate to convert from {currency} to {baseCurrency}
exchange_rate.currency_help_text: This provider will only be used on above selected currencies
exchange_rate.currency_in_used: The following currencies are already active on another provider. Please remove these currencies from selection to activate this provider again.

tax_types.title: Tax Types
tax_types.description: You can add or Remove Taxes as you please. Crater supports Taxes on Individual Items as well as on the invoice.
tax_types.tax_setting_description: Enable this if you want to add taxes to individual invoice items. By default, taxes are added directly to the invoice.
tax_types.confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this Tax Type

payment_modes.title: Payment Modes
payment_modes.payment_mode_confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this Payment Mode
payment_modes.payments_attached: This payment method is already attached to payments. Please delete the attached payments to proceed with deletion.
payment_modes.expenses_attached: This payment method is already attached to expenses. Please delete the attached expenses to proceed with deletion.

expense_category.title: Expense Categories
expense_category.description: Categories are required for adding expense entries. You can Add or Remove these categories according to your preference.
expense_category.confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this Expense Category

preferences.discount_setting_description: Enable this if you want to add Discount to individual invoice items. By default, Discount is added directly to the invoice.
preferences.expire_setting_description: Specify whether you would like to expire all the links sent by application to view invoices, estimates & payments, etc after a specified duration.

update_app.title: Update App
update_app.description: You can easily update Crater by checking for a new update by clicking the button below
update_app.progress_text: It will just take a few minutes. Please do not refresh the screen or close the window before the update finishes
update_app.update_success: App has been updated! Please wait while your browser window gets reloaded automatically.
update_app.latest_message: No update available! You are on the latest version.
update_app.update_failed_text: Sorry! Your update failed on : {step} step
update_app.update_warning: All of the application files and default template files will be overwritten when you update the application using this utility. Please take a backup of your templates & database before updating.

backup.title: Backup | Backups
backup.description: The backup is a zipfile that contains all files in the directories you specify along with a dump of your database
backup.backup_confirm_delete: You will not be able to recover this Backup

disk.title: File Disk | File Disks
disk.description: By default, Crater will use your local disk for saving backups, avatar and other image files. You can configure more than one disk drivers like DigitalOcean, S3 and Dropbox according to your preference.
disk.name: Name
disk.set_default_disk_confirm: This disk will be set as default and all the new PDFs will be saved on this disk
disk.disk_setting_description: Enable this, if you wish to save a copy of each Invoice, Estimate & Payment Receipt PDF on your default disk automatically. Turning this option will decrease the load-time when viewing the PDFs.
disk.confirm_delete: Your existing files & folders in the specified disk will not be affected but your disk configuration will be deleted from Crater

taxations.modal_description: The information below is required in order to fetch sales tax.
taxations.add_address: Add Address for fetching sales tax.

wizard.account_info_desc: Below details will be used to create the main Administrator account. Also you can change the details anytime after logging in.
wizard.name: Name
wizard.company_info_desc: This information will be displayed on invoices. Note that you can edit this later on settings page.
wizard.preferences_desc: Specify the default preferences for this company.
wizard.currency_set_alert: The company's currency cannot be changed later.

database.desc: Create a database on your server and set the credentials using the form below.

permissions.permission_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to continue?
permissions.permission_desc: Below is the list of folder permissions which are required in order for the app to work. If the permission check fails, make sure to update your folder permissions.

verify_domain.title: Domain Verification
verify_domain.desc: Crater uses Session based authentication which requires domain verification for security purposes. Please enter the domain on which you will be accessing your web application.
verify_domain.failed: Domain verification failed. Please enter valid domain name.

mail.mail_config_desc: Below is the form for Configuring Email driver for sending emails from the app. You can also configure third party providers like Sendgrid, SES etc.

req.system_req_desc: Crater has a few server requirements. Make sure that your server has the required php version and all the extensions mentioned below.

errors.database_variables_save_error: Cannot write configuration to .env file. Please check its file permissions

validation.payment_greater_than_due_amount: Entered Payment is more than due amount of this invoice.
validation.quantity_maxlength: Quantity should not be greater than 20 digits.
validation.price_maxlength: Price should not be greater than 20 digits.
validation.amount_maxlength: Amount should not be greater than 20 digits.
validation.discount_maxlength: Discount should not be greater than max discount
validation.description_maxlength: Description should not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.subject_maxlength: Subject should not be greater than 100 characters.
validation.message_maxlength: Message should not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.maximum_options_error: Maximum  of {max} options selected. First remove a selected option to select another.
validation.notes_maxlength: Notes should not be greater than 65,000 characters.
validation.address_maxlength: Address should not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.ref_number_maxlength: Ref Number should not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.prefix_maxlength: Prefix should not be greater than 5 characters.
validation.number_length_minvalue: Number length should be greater than 0
validation.valid_exchange_rate: Please enter a valid exchange rate.
validation.company_name_not_same: Company name must match with given name.
